name: Bakery Food Diner - Bake & Make Cakes Pizza Pancakes & Lollipops - Free Cooking Games For Kids
name_original: Bakery Food Diner - Bake & Make Cakes Pizza Pancakes & Lollipops - Free Cooking Games For Kids
description:
Welcome to Bakery Dash - The Create Pancakes, Pizza, Cupcakes & Lollipops Edition brings the most fun cooking game yet to your iPhone, iPad & iPod Touch!

Features FOUR different kinds of food;

Pancakes, Lollipops, Cupcakes & Pizza!

Lots of decoration options such as fruit, syrups, and spicy toppings, not to mention choices of spoons, plates, backgrounds and much more!

Step-by-step instructions and easy-to-use controls, make this game such a fun experience for all ages!

When you have finished cooking, why not share your skills by showing your friends via built-in Twitter sharing or via the in-app email feature!

You can also eat your tasty treat! With 10 bites available, can you finish it all?

Have fun, are you ready to cook?
